review_body: I have never had issues with the app. They have even started including the seasonal grill items. Makes ordering from the grill easy.
It didn't work with 6 attemps. Couldn't place order
Unbelievably inconvenient. Only prepared food, no ad, not departments. Installed and app precisely for that purpose.
This app is so convenient for me to order from the deli. Worked like a charm.

Great App! Only problem is that on Android it has a section for Special Instructions, but they don't get passed on to Deli.  I asked the Deli and they said that feature isn't supported and wasn't supposed to be in the app.
Excellent app Tried it for the first time today. Worked great. I see that there's no option to select oatmeal. It would be great if you guys can add it.
We all need to eat here..love this place
Awesome app My food was nice and hot and ready when I went to pick it up. Great app and easy to use.
